as 'Test <test@example.com>'
at '2025-09-27T14:30:00Z'

mkdir repo
cd repo
git init
git commit --allow-empty -m 'Initial commit'
gs repo init

# Trunk cannot be tracked
git checkout main
! gs downstack track
stderr 'cannot track trunk'

# Branches that don't exist cannot be tracked
! gs downstack track nonexistent
stderr 'branch nonexistent does not exist'

# Branches that are already tracked are no-ops.
gs repo init --reset --trunk=main
gs bc -m 'Add feat1' feat1
gs branch track feat1
gs downstack track
stderr 'feat1: branch is already tracked'
